newsitem.title: USA: TeleTech in 5-year pact with GTE.
newsitem.headline: TeleTech in 5-year pact with GTE.

text.p: TeleTech Holdings Inc said it had entered into a five-year master agreement with GTE Corp to provide support for a new national sales, service and marketing unit GTE announced earlier this month.
Terms of the agreement, which is renewable for two additional one-year terms, were not disclosed.

Initially, TeleTech is expected to use about 1,200 production workstations in several dedicated call centers in support of this contract, it said. TeleTech will begin providing turnkey customer acquisition, retention and loyalty solutions across multiple GTE product offers later this year.
